name: profilarr
description: Profilarr is a self-hosted automation tool for managing Plex libraries and related services like Sonarr and Radarr. It allows defining scanning and repair tasks through a web UI.

features.title: Library Automation
features.description: Automate Plex library scanning, maintenance, and optimization tasks

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Define and enforce quality standards across your media library automatically

features.title: Scheduled Tasks
features.description: Configure automated scanning, repair, and optimization on custom schedules

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Manage all automation tasks through a clean, intuitive web dashboard

features.title: Media Analysis
features.description: Analyze library content for quality issues, missing metadata, and optimization opportunities
